title: Directs the notification of certain victims of certain felons of name changes by such felons
summary: Directs the division of criminal justice services, in cooperation with the state administrator of the unified court system, to notify the victim of certain felons of the felon's name change at the most current address or telephone number provided by such victim in the most reasonable and expedient possible manner, or if the victim cannot be located or is deceased, notify the victim's immediate family, if possible.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the notification of victims of certain felons of name changes by such felons
